name: Mikey Grau
coverLetter:
Greetings,
I've been trimming as long I've been farming, so about 10 years. Currently I'm in the process of expanding, but state compliance takes time so I'm looking for full-time work in the meantime. Depending on quality, trimming 1lb/day shouldn't be a problem. I'm free now until Janurary so hopefully there is enough work! :) 

Bless
-Mikey Gray
(772)342-5124
